title: Bug. My progress won't continue to grow. Stop at around 20k gold act 1 TF. Pls help
body: Its stop at 20 300gold. Wont move on no matter h∆° many games I play. Pls help.

replies.body: I am having the same issue. I have played at least 6 ARAM games and its stuck at 11k gold from last nights score. This is quite frustrating
How long will it take to update the match history then? Thanks

See if your match history is updating. 
I have the same problem, but I think it is because my match history isn't showing my most recent games.
